website_summaries.verdict: The Inov-8 Fastlift 335 helped a significant number of training enthusiasts feel more stable and confident when lifting. The platform was firm and grippy, and the elevated heel allowed for a more in-depth squat, even under heavier weight. On the downside, many wearers had difficulties in getting the right size and fit, and some complained about the frailty of the Velcro strap. But on the whole, the shoe was able to have a positive effect on the weightlifting and cross-training performance of its owners.
pros: Many users expressed contentment with the firm platform of the Inov-8 Fastlift 335
it didn’t compress under heavy weight
A lot of testers felt supported and steady in the trainer
The product seemed to be well-made, according to most buyers
Several consumers mentioned that the flexible forefoot made it less unwieldy for walking and moving around
Those who tried exercising in weightlifting-specific shoes for the first time noticed a significant improvement in their squat performance
This shoe was praised for its traction
some reviewers agreed that they felt cemented to the floor
The combination of the laces and a Velcro strap provided a secure fit, as stated by a handful of users
cons: A large number of purchasers observed that this weightlifting shoe was shorter and narrower than they expected
Several wearers complained that the Velcro strap started to come apart after only a short period of use

customer_reviews.title: Best training equipment/clothing purchase I've made!
customer_reviews.text: It's the first time I bought this brand or a specialist lifting shoe so unfortunately can't compare them to anything similar. All I can say is, I should have been using something like this for years now. Much more stability than my regular trainers and a more comfortable heel position than barefoot. I'm lifting heavier with more confidence and they look great! I'm normally a size 11 with a wide foot. I bought 10.5 (off the advice here), perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wigginton

customer_reviews.title: Top Draw
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these for over 4 years now and they are still in good condition. I use these 2 per week for heavy compound and power lifts. I can not knock these in the slightest. They provide excellent support and stability and are light enough to effectively box jump or skip.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant shoe. I used to wear chuck Taylor's for ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant shoe. I used to wear chuck Taylor's for my lifts and felt they were adequate support and were flat. Once I started lifting in these it felt completely different. The slight elevation in the heel and solid flat sole make a tonne of difference. Squats and deads feel like I'm glued to the floor and you can really push through your heels with ease. They are very light and can be used for box jumps, skipping, etc. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for weightlfting with a workout
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Not as ridged as other weightlifting shoes, but I was after something I could also do box jumps and double unders in. They are supportive, have improved my lifts and they look great. I've had these for a few years and would buy another pair again. I just wish I'd been able to get them in a half size, but I put a thin insole in and it was fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Harry_Bristol

customer_reviews.title: Great but the size!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried it yet, but with the first impression is that the materials are really cool and solid platform the shoe has. Despite its features and very nice looking, where the shoe appearance is fantastic to be worn, I feel less confortable at the position of my toe, it is a little bit harder than I thought as for prorection. However, my size is 45 I do not think the shoes is really 45 because it does not fit completely on my foot. I suggest that the company has to revision the sizes to avoid such a problem. All in all, the shoe has amazing colour, modern, and stylish. But the size is really matter.
customer_reviews.author: q8i3zizan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just to add to the other reviews, they're right - these shoes make a difference. Stability, form and added confidence combined with a great fit. I'm normally 10.5 in a shoe, 11 in trainers and for me 11.5 was perfect. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: man with a camera

customer_reviews.title: Great💪😀
customer_reviews.text: Great weight lifting trainers. Helps with balance. You feel routed to the floor when lifting. Comfortable and the added benefit of the Velcro strap gives a firm locked in feel. Wish I bought these a while back but glad I took my time in searching for the right pair. Don't go to the gym without them. A must buy...
customer_reviews.author: dean murphy

customer_reviews.title: I'd highly recommend ordering from these guys
customer_reviews.text: I'd highly recommend ordering from these guys. I ordered a 9 which is what my Asics and work shoes are but they were too small so swapped for a 9.5 which were also too small so ended up in a whopping 10. But the swapping was easy and quick even by post. Thanks 👍
customer_reviews.author: KentJem

customer_reviews.title: Still a great shoe and im looking forward to moving my training ...
customer_reviews.text: slightly tight on my toes as I have a wider foot but not uncomfortably so. Still a great shoe and im looking forward to moving my training on to the next level
customer_reviews.author: gwarski

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, I struggle a little with ankle flexibility ...
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, I struggle a little with ankle flexibility and these really help. They are comfortable and look good, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Games

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lifting shoes, helped my form and stability. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Jacqueline A. Gough

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I dont normally write reviews but these shoes are worth every penny. I dont even want to go to the gym anymore without them. Im just an average gym user, not a powerlifter but they are perfect and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: tommy kosac

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, great fit.
customer_reviews.text: A great shoe. I have wide feet and these fit better than any I have had previously. Stability for me when squatting and deadlifting is awesome plus they are very light. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: ninja

customer_reviews.title: great quality and tons of support
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy, great quality and tons of support. Deadlifting like a pro!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight lifting shoe
customer_reviews.text: Looks stunning, nice fit (though I would recommend going down 1/2 size from your normal shoe size". Solid and secure when lifting, Sufficiently flexible and light to be comfortable for the non-lifting exercises.
customer_reviews.author: peter ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: Best weight lifting / training shoes I have had, solid on the ankle and a good heel raise for squats.
customer_reviews.author: ian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best lifting shoes I have ever had. Week worth the money
customer_reviews.author: john richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great crossfit shoes very happy
customer_reviews.text: Got these shoes for cross fit training and I love them extremely functional great for lifts and box jumps short sprints! Highly recommend these shoes
customer_reviews.author: gary macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great look and perfect if you have wider than average feet
customer_reviews.author: kelly girl

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes well worth the money and very light. Sizing correct for a wide foot person maybe half a size smaller for a narrow footed person. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, small size at first but returned and got the right size after just a couple of Days. Super!
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy I ordered size 10 Uk and received wrong ...
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy I ordered size 10 Uk and received wrong size 10 us which was too small Be carefull when you order it say is in uk size but doesnt mean it realy will be uk Needed shoes as soon as possible now is late :(
customer_reviews.author: Robert Obrcian

customer_reviews.title: Late.
customer_reviews.text: Product is good but the estimated delivery date was set back, so I couldn’t perform at a compitition, with no reason as to the set back. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great weightlifting shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Adidas Powerlift shoes last year, way too stiff and quite uncomfortable. These are a good fit and allow good 'spread' in the toes and the heel provides ample stability for force transfer. Great for squats, presses and Olympic lifts. Probably not the best for Deadlifting due to the raised heel though. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Baz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great lifting shoe, instantly felt comfortable using them, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Inov-8 do it again!
customer_reviews.text: A great product from a company which stands up to its name! I normally wear the inov-8 bare XF 210 but needed an Oly shoe for getting into the correct position for squats and completing crossfit wods. I tried the Reebok Oly shoes but felt them too clumpy. As expecked, these fit much the same as my Bare fx and feel very supportive and comfortable. Thanks inov8!
customer_reviews.author: Pt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent comfortable trainers, just as I would expect from inov-8
customer_reviews.author: Pt

product_meta.title: inov-8 Men's Fastlift 335 Cross Trainer Shoes
product_meta.description: A state-of-the-art lifter series delivers maximum stability and forefoot flexibility for functional and plyometric training. The lightest, most flexible shoe in weightlifting. The Fastlift 325 offers unmatched versatility in the performance training category with its superior flexibility and grip paired with inov-8's powertruss heel system for stability.
feature_bullets: Nylon ripstop upper with lightweight welded synthetic overlays
